Description: Wooden shabti with plain tripartite wig, arms crossed in relief, nine lines of incised hieroglyphs, originally filled in with white (?) pigment, giving chapter 6 of the Book of the Dead with spaces left blank for name of purchaser.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
